snippet: Dr. Barbara Sampson was named New York’s chief medical examiner late last year, becoming the first woman to head the office as it seeks to right itself after high-profile mistakes.
abstract: Profile of Dr Barbara Sampson, New York City's first female chief medical examiner, who is seeking to establish department as a leader in state-of-the-art research; Sampson's efforts come as department seeks to right itself following series of high-profile errors.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Barbara Sampson was named New York’s chief medical examiner late last year, becoming the first woman to head the office as it seeks to right itself after high-profile mistakes.

headline.main: New York’s Chief Medical Examiner Seeks to Lead in DNA Research
headline.print_headline: Steering a Morgue to Lead in Research

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Office of the Chief Medical Examiner of the City of New York
